oai_dc:dc.dc:title: White. James White, 1793.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: James White
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: MM-2013-004 James White note to Lt. Robert Rhea, September 9, 1793. Re: collect your troop of horse(?) & take the track of the horses taken from Calwells and do your best to overtake the thieves & chastise them & retake the horses.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Horses;
